name: Spirit Locket of Boreas
description: A bit of the Great Wolf King of the North's power drawn from its soul.  This land was once a realm of freezing-cold blizzards and ice storms filledwith razor-sharp ice shards, all at the command of Boreas. In his finalmoments, he finally realized the chilling north wind could only extinguishlife, not nurture it. Therefore, Boreas let his powers freely flow into theland to protect it and its inhabitants.
